title: CoinDesk 20 Performance Update: Litecoin (LTC) Gains 7.7%, Leading Index Higher
summary: Sui (SUI) joined Litecoin (LTC) as a top performer, gaining 3.9%.
author: CoinDesk Indices
content:
CoinDesk Indices presents its daily market update, highlighting the performance of leaders and laggards in the CoinDesk 20 Index.

The CoinDesk 20 is currently trading at 2736.75, up 1.5% (+41.53) since 4 p.m. ET on Tuesday.

Sixteen of 20 assets are trading higher.

Leaders: LTC (+7.7%) and SUI (+3.9%).

Laggards: AVAX (-1.2%) and UNI (-1.1%).

The CoinDesk 20 is a broad-based index traded on multiple platforms in several regions globally.

llm_analysis.reasoning: The CoinDesk 20 Index is up 1.5% with 16 of 20 assets trading higher, led by significant gains in LTC (+7.7%) and SUI (+3.9%).
